ygData.subject: RE: mino horn
ygData.msgSnippet: the mino guards of mel are blue and green (with no xp)  to me at 35. Mel is level 35 as well and the hero is always even fight or blue to me Minkin Sol ro
ygData.messageBody:
the mino guards of mel are blue and green (with no xp) to me at 35. Mel is
level 35 as well
and the hero is always even fight or blue to me

Minkin
Sol ro
level 35

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Greg Gillan [SMTP:GGillan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 11:15 AM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] mino horn
>
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
> If these mino guards were blue to a level 50, they've been changed
> recently.
> I was there last week with most of my guild, trying to get Meldrath's
> skull
> for a few of our rangers. The mino guards con'd green to me at 47, and
> yellow to one of our Paladin's in his 20's. Meldrath con'd blue however,
> and I'd say high blue from how hard he'd hit.
>
>
> Elwyn
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: jay schultze [mailto:sartori69@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 11:19 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] mino horn
>
>
> From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>
> >The minos in Steamfont are weaker than the minos in the Gorge of King
> Xorrb
> >(all except for one Mino Hero who is a real meanie!)
>
> Actually, you're right about the mino slavers, but the minotaur guards in
> Meldrath's room are blue to a lvl 50 and hit for 75+. They are very mean.
> =)
>
> They make the Minotaur Hero look like pansy. Well, since last I checked
> anyways (bout 3 weeks ago).
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companion>
> Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus
> Veeshan
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
> with
> the subject lol.
